atk-s0402a33:2_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame yathābhataṁ nikkhittoti yathā ānetvā ṭhapito. Dutiye sāvajjenāti sadosena.
atk-s0402a33:4_1: Dasame sunakkhattantiādīsu yasmiṁ divase tayo sucaritadhammā pūritā honti,
atk-s0402a33:4_3: tenassa sadā sunakkhattaṁ nāma hotīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a33:4_7: sayanato uṭṭhānampi suhuṭṭhitameva, khaṇopi sukkhaṇova, muhuttopi sumuhuttova.
atk-s0402a33:4_8: Ettha ca dasaccharapamāṇo kālo khaṇo nāma,
atk-s0402a33:4_9: tena khaṇena dasakkhaṇo kālo layo nāma,
atk-s0402a33:4_10: tena layena ca dasalayo kālo khaṇalayo nāma, tena dasaguṇo muhutto nāma,
atk-s0402a33:4_11: tena dasaguṇo khaṇamuhutto nāmāti ayaṁ vibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a33:4_12: Suyiṭṭhaṁ brahmacārisūti yasmiṁ divase tīṇi sucaritāni pūritāni,
atk-s0402a33:4_13: tadāssa seṭṭhacārīsu dinnadānaṁ suyiṭṭhaṁ nāma hoti .
atk-s0402a33:4_14: Padakkhiṇaṁ kāyakammanti taṁ divasaṁ tena kataṁ kāyakammaṁ vaḍḍhikāyakammaṁ nāma hoti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a33:4_16: Labhantatthe padakkhiṇeti padakkhiṇe vaḍḍhiattheyeva labhati. Sesaṁ uttānamevāti.
